tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (NNS things)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (ADVP (RB never)) (VB get) (ADJP (JJR better)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NN time))) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG putting) (NP (DT the) (NN cover)) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ your) (NN duvet))))))))) (. .)))
